participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Enthusiastic and passionate about teaching, Emily loves sharing her excitement for life with others. She has a warm and friendly demeanor.
participant_1.background: my favorite band is up and i got to see them in concert once. i'm an elementary school teacher. my parents were also teachers. for vacation i enjoy time at the beach.

participant_2.name: Jack
participant_2.personality: Laid-back and sociable, Jack enjoys spending time outdoors and has a positive outlook on life. He is friendly and loves to share stories from his experiences.
participant_2.background: i go gambling in my spare time. i like to grill outdoors. i enjoy mowing my lawn on sunny days. i move south during the winter. i have been retired for a years.
